title: Lots of T206's for Trade Mathewson,Chance,Tinker
author: t206hof

posts.post_title: Lots of T206's for Trade Mathewson,Chance,Tinker
posts.post_content:
Hi, I have some T206's I wouldnt mind trading. I am really after a low grade Cobb or Johnson. But ill be intrested in any kind of deal. Cards im looking to trade are as follows and I can send scans of any card if intrested.

Christy Mathewson Portrait Piedmont 150 (PSA 1)
George Davis Piedmont 150 (PSA 4)
Addie Joss Pitching Piedmont 350-460 (SGC 10)
Chief Bender No trees Polar Bear (SGC 30)
Heinie Wagner Bat on Left SC Fac 649 Overprint (PSA 4)
Jimmy Phelan Portrait Piedmont 350 (PSA 3.5)
Charlie Rhodes Portrait EPDG (PSA 2)
Paul Davidson SC 350 (PSA 2)
Roger Bresnahan Portrait SC Fac 649 Overprint (PSA 2.5)
Jimmy Lavender EPDG (PSA 2)
Bill Cranston Southern League Old Mill (PSA 3)
Hal Chase Dark Cap SC 350-460 (SGC 30)
Joe Tinker Portrait Piedmont 150 (SGC 30)
Harry Howell Portrait Piedmont 350 (GAI 3)

John Mcgraw Finger in Air Piedmont (Fair)
Frank Chance Red Portrait SC 150 (Poor)
Rube Marquard Portrait Piedmont 350 (Poor)
Claude Ritchey SC 150 (good)
George Mullin Batting SC Fac 42 Overprint (Good to Very Good)
Joe Lake No ball Polar Bear (Fair)
Frank Smith Dark cap Old Mill (Poor)

Let me know what you have and if your intrested. Thanks
